question_sets.name: Mannheim Function Calling Benchmark: Questions w/ Multi Step and One Shot for Sequential Function Calling
question_sets.description: Simple, multiple step questions designed to test a subset of selection of records, interpretation, reasoning, different languages, typos, related and unrelated context using sequential function calling

questions.question: Among all the albums of Kanye West, return the album with the maximum rating.
A very famous artist of US, couldn’t recall his name, whose song is 'Mockingbird' is one of my favourites.  Can you find his name and please return his all albums that are rated above 2.5.
Among the albums with rating > 3.5 and minimum number of rating as 30000, select the album released in 2022 and provide the songs of that album.
Provide me the album with the third lowest number of reviews of the same artist as that of 'Ray of Light'.

I like songs with high energy, my friend recommended an artist and his albums, but I only remember the name of album “Oasis”. Can you please provide the songs of this artist with bpm in the range of 120-160.
I have heard a lot about this song ‘Cruel Summer’ by some artist. Can you find its artist and return me the average of the number of ratings received by his/her albums.
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform aggregation (average) on the result.

questions.question: Of all the albums of Olivia Rodrigo, please get the songs of her album released in 2021 and return the one with the highest bpm value.
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to find maximum value of specific attribute in the result.

questions.question: Please return the album with the lowest rating released in the same year in which Mistletoe was released.
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to find minimum value of specific attribute in the result.

questions.question: How many songs are released by the co-artist of Taylor Swift in the song “The Joker and the Queen (feat. Taylor Swift)”?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform aggregation (counting) on the results.

parameters.song_name: The Joker and the Queen (feat. Taylor Swift)

questions.question: Can you please return the sum of the number of reviews received by the albums of the famous band whose song is Creep?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform aggregation (sum) on the specific attribute of results.

questions.question: Of the two singers of song Merry Christmas, who is the older one?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to identify lowest value w.r.t date.

questions.question: I am organizing a party and compiling songs with high beats. Can you get the albums of Bad Bunny and please recommend the songs from his most recent album which are suitable for the party.

I cannot remember the artist name of this famous song “Perfect”. Can you please find the artist and then his albums and return the one which is most popular. I consider popularity to be proportional to the number of reviews received by the albums.

expected_answers: Identifies a potential correlation between speechiness and explicitness ÷ (Divide)

questions.question: Of all the albums released in 2000, which album do you think is not suitable for children and why? Also return the songs of this album.
Find the albums of the artist of song “Blank Space” and predict what 3 genres could likely be of his/her upcoming album based on previous genres.

expected_answers: Country Pop, Pop Rock, Folk Pop

questions.question: Ich mag das Album von Lady Gaga, das 2008 veröffentlicht wurde, sehr. Finden Sie ihre Alben und können Sie mir dann die Künstler empfehlen, die dem gleichen Genre wie das genannte Album angehören.
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand questions in different popular and unpopular languages (German in this case).

questions.question: 'Love and Theft' 앨범의 아티스트가 미국 출신인지 영국 출신인지는 기억나지 않습니다. 내 혼란을 없애 주시겠습니까?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand questions in different popular and unpopular languages (Korean in this case).

expected_answers: Bob Dylan is from United States.

questions.question: उस वर्ष में रिलीज़ हुए सभी एल्बम प्रदान करें जिसमें एनचांटेड गाना रिलीज़ किया गया था।
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand questions in different popular and unpopular languages (Hindi in this case).

questions.question: Türlerinden biri Merseybeat olan sanatçının son 5 albümünü bana verin.
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand questions in different popular and unpopular languages (Turkish in this case).

questions.question: Jaa kappaleen 'Sigue' toisen artistin nimi ja tiedot, paitsi Ed Sheeran.
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand questions in different popular and unpopular languages (Finnish in this case).

expected_answers: The second artist is J Balvin, born in Mediilin,Colombia on 7th May 1985.

question_sets.name: Mannheim Function Calling Benchmark: Questions w/ Multiple Parameters, Single Step and One Shot
question_sets.description: Simple single step questions designed to test a subset of selection of extra context, reasoning, different languages, typos, aggregation, data types with multi parameter functions

questions.question: What is the song with the second highest average rating among songs released between 2000 and 2001?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on criterion (small floating point number)

expected_answers: Lift Yr. Skinny Fists Like Antennas to Heaven!

questions.question: Among all 'Wonky' but not 'Deconstructed Club' albums, with less than 5 genres, what has the highest rating?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset. Identify genres correctly, identify elements (genres) in list.

questions.question: Among all 'Wonky' but not 'Deconstructed Club' albums, which album has between 5 and 6 genres and a review count below 100?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on the criterion (count items in list, select by integer bound).

expected_answers: Niggas on the Moon: The Powers That B Disc 1

questions.question: What adult, television songs were released in 2023 with a rating lower than 3.0?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on the criterion (small double integer range).

questions.question: Among the top 3 songs of Coldplay, which one was released in 2002?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (date).

questions.question: Which albums released between June 2020 and Sep 2020 are by Taylor Swift?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (date range) among 43 other records.

questions.question: Among all the non-explitic songs with a dancability of 90 or more, what song has the longest duration?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (min. small floating point number).

questions.question: Among all the non-explitic songs with a dancability of 90 or more, what songs have a duration over 3 minutes?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (small floating point number range).

expected_answers: 'YOU THE VIBE', 'DOGGY DOGGY', 'MOLI', 'PALETA PA TO EL MUNDO', 'RICO FEO', and 'TEKIRIKI'

questions.question: Among the albums released between 5.5.2000 and 9.9.2000, which are the most similar based on genres?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on similarity matching (reasoning) on items in list

expected_answers: 'The Moon & Antarctica' and 'Rated R' on Rock
'The Moon & Antarctica' and 'Spirit They're Gone Spirit They've Vanished' on exact match on Neo-Psychedelia

questions.question: What are the non-explicit songs with a danceability over 85 percent, and speechiness over 10% that has a duration over 4 minutes?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (small floating point number range).

questions.question: Which Hip Hop album was released in 2000, and contains 'vulgar' language?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on identifying vular as descriptor (and not genre).

questions.question: Provide me those songs from top 10 songs of Taylor Swift released in 2022, which have bpm in the range of 80-110.
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (integer range).

questions.question: From the list of albums released in 2020 of type Indie Folk which are melodic, poetic, return those albums having rating between 3.0 and 3.5.
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (small floating point number range).

expected_answers: 'Folklore', 'Evermore', 'Women in Music Pt. III' and 'Color Theory'

questions.question: Among the top 5 songs released by SZA in 2022, which have the most similarity based on BPM?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on similarity (reasoning;  larger integer and very close).

questions.question: Which album is released between 2000 and 2002, contains Hip Hop but not Metal and has a rating of 3.9 or more?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on date, genres and floating point arguments.

questions.question: Which explicit songs with a speechiness of 50%, energy of 50% and bpm of 100 have a duration between 2.75 and 3.5 minutes?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (small floating point number range).

questions.question: Which albums released in 2000, have a minimum of 5000 ratings, with at least an average rating of 3.5 and a minimum of 200 reviews, and rock as genre?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on criterion (min. date).

questions.question: Which albums are released between 2000 and 2002, contain Hip Hop but not Metal and have a rating of 3.5 or more?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based identifying genres, and dates and returning all records.

expected_answers: 'Since I Left You', 'The Marshall Mathers LP', and 'Stankonia'

questions.question: Get the list of albums released in 1988 with min rating 3.5 and reviewed by more than 200 and rated by minimum 5000 persons. From this list, only provide those albums that are of type Progressive Metal.
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on the criterion (string matching in list of items per record).

expected_answers: '...And Justice for All' and 'Seventh Son of a Seventh Son'

questions.question: Which 2 explicit songs with a speechiness of 30, energy of 30% and bpm of 120 with an allowed difference of 25 are the most similar to each other based on acousticness?

expected_answers: 'Scared Of My Money' and 'Big Fish' with 9
'Don't Hurt Me' and 'Fuck You Too' with 16

questions.question: Among albums which were rated greater than 4 by more than 55000 people, which one is the most reviewed?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to find maximum value of specific attribute in the result.

expected_answers: The Dark Side of the Moon

questions.question: Which is the least popular song among the songs with minimum danceability of 87%?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to find minimum value of specific attribute in the result.

questions.question: Can you provide me the average value of energy for the top 5 songs of SZA.
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform aggregation (average) on the result.

questions.question: What is the total value of reviews received by albums released in the duration of March, 2010 to May 2010?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform aggregation (sum) on the specific attribute of results.

questions.question: How many of 85% danceable songs containing obscene words have more than 1 artist?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform aggregation (counting) on the results.

questions.question: Among the top 8 songs of Eminem performed in 2023, which one has the lowest liveliness value?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to find minimum value of specific attribute in the result.

questions.question: Among the top 6 songs of Taylor Swift performed in 2023, which one has the highest value of bpm?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to find maximum value of specific attribute in the result.

expected_answers: Better Than Revenge(Taylor's Version) with 146 bpm.

questions.question: Among all the explicit songs with a danceability of 80 or more and speechiness above 39, which song has the longest duration?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to find maximum value of specific attribute in the result.

questions.question: How many albums were released in 2023 which are melodic and are of type Pop Rock?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform aggregation (counting) on the results.

questions.question: From the list of albums released in 1988 having rating > 3.5 which were reviewed by more than 200 people and rated by a minimum 15000 persons, provide me the total count of reviewers of all albums.
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform aggregation (sum) on the specific attribute of results.

questions.question: Provide me the average number of streams of songs of Taylor Swift released in the time period of April till Dec of 2023.
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform aggregation (average) on the result.

questions.question: Are there any similarities between the genres of the albums released in November 2023 and in November 2022, can you make an inference? Can you explain why?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to correctly predict the similarities of genres between the entities belonging to different years

expected_answers: It needs to make reasoning about inability of finding similarities since there is no released albums in November of 2022

questions.question: Can you categorize the genres broadly and tell how many songs under these categories among the albums which have min. rating higher than 4.2, review count higher than 100 and rating count higher than 1000.Can you explain how you categorize?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to make categorization and test the model's awareness about dataset's attributes

expected_answers: The model needs to explain its reasoning process about how it categorizes genres and to mention that that the actual number of songs in each category will require access to the track listings of each album, which is not provided in the current dataset.

questions.question: I consider popularity to be based on the number of reviews received by the album. Provide me the most popular album from the list of albums released in 2020 of type Indie Folk which are melodic and poetic.
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to correctly reason value transition

questions.question: I am hosting a birthday party for my child. Can you please recommend some latest songs which are suitable for children. Why?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to correctly identify the function to be called making commonsense reasoning and order according to the latestness.

expected_answers: Hole in the Bottom of My Brain
Nice to meet you (feat. Central Cee)

questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to correctly identify common genres between albums

questions.question: How many times can I listen to each of the five longest songs on the playlist of longest songs in 2 hours?

questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to correctly identify simple typos and aggregate and make a calculation.

questions.question: Among the albums which have more than 4 genres, more than 2 artists and rating higher than 3.5, Whose album name means a machine to represent the orbits of astroomical bodies?

questions.question: Among the albums which have more than 4 genes, more than 2 artists and rating higher than 3.5, which one has the loest review count?

target.comment: Even though the function returns values below the max_rating_threshold, it was stated as more than to test the model capability of differentiating function requirements.

questions.question: The Aircraft Crash Report, one of National Geographic's most popular series, continues to investigate what went wrong and why, exploring the legendary disasters of aviation history. I like to follow aviation events and news. Despite following such news, I feel peaceful on the flight. The year I travelled the most was the summer of 2018. I want to listen to the albums from the summer of 2018 in June. Can you bring me the songs I mentioned?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand the context(modified wordings) and make an inference about date range

questions.question: In 1961, in the American state of Philadelphia, on the first Friday after Thanksgiving, there was a great discount in the stores. The interest in this discount is so intense that convoys lasting hours are formed due to traffic congestion. In recent years, especially during the pandemic period, the excitement of Black Friday has increased exponentially as e-commerce sites have become indispensable in our lives. Can you return 6 top streamed songs of The Weeknd that were released in recent years that store employees can play in the stores in the order of up-to-dateness?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand the context and to call the function to be called, incorporating ordering logic.

questions.question: I find some song lyrics very meaningful, there are songs that give me goosebumps when I come across them somewhere and listen to them. I am adding the lyrics of one of them: If the deepest wounds are closing,If the greatest pains are forgotten, tell me what to fear in life. Can you bring unrivaled albums that are known with their artist collaboration and genre diversity,even were not rated that well?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand the context and to logicaly assign parameter values considering context.

expected_answers: The Good, the Bad & the Queen

questions.question: Cycling in winter in Germany is doable - but you may need to take extra care to make sure you stay safe on wet or icy roads.Can you bring me amusing and playful songs in the alternative, pop rock genres, released in 1985 to get me in the mood while cycling?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand the context(modified wordings) and to call the function that can be called

questions.question: We are currently standing at Niagara Falls and are a group of 5 girls, enjoying our first vacation post pandemic. We have been waiting for this time for so long. The weather is also sunny and breezy and the sight is breathtaking. We have been friends since 2000. Can you provide some albums released in this year, that has a minimum of 35000 ratings, with at least an average rating of 3.5 and a minimum of 200 reviews?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to understand the context and to call the function that can be called with the correct parameters mentioned in the question.

expected_answers: Lift Yr. Skinny Fists Like Antennas to Heaven!

function_sets.name: Music - one and multi parameter functions with elaborative function description, no examples.

functions.name: artist_info
functions.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specified artist, including attributes like name, band status, formation/birth date, city, country, genres, and related artists.

artist_name.description: The name of the artist. Matches against the 'Name' column in the ARTIST_SQL dataset.

functions.name: album_info
functions.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific album, covering attributes such as album name, artist name, release date, genres, descriptors, average rating, rating count, and review count.

album_name.description: The name of the album. Matches against the 'release_name' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: song_info
functions.description: Provides detailed information on a specific song, including track name, artist(s) name, album name, artist count, release date, streams, BPM, key, mode, danceability, valence, energy, acousticness, instrumentalness, liveness, speechiness, and duration in minutes.

song_name.description: The name of the song. Matches against the 'track_name' column in the SONGS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: albums_by_artist
functions.description: Retrieves all albums by a specific artist, searching through the 'artist_name' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset. It includes album name, artist name, release date, genres, descriptors, average rating, rating count, and review count.

artist_name.description: The artist's name to search albums for. The search is performed within the 'artist_name' column, supporting partial matches.

functions.name: artists_by_genres
functions.description: Finds artists that match any of the specified genres, utilizing the 'genres' column in the ARTIST_SQL dataset. It covers artist's name, is_band status, formation/birth date, city, country, genres, and related artists.

genres.description: List of genre strings to filter artists by. The filtering checks the 'genres' column for any matches.

functions.name: songs_by_album
functions.description: Retrieves all songs from a specific album, including details such as track name, artist(s) name, album name, artist count, release date, streams, and various musical and acoustic properties like BPM, danceability, and duration in minutes.

album_name.description: The name of the album to find songs for. Matches against the 'album_name' column in the SONGS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: max_rating_given_albums
functions.description: Finds the highest average rating from a list of specified albums. Returns the maximum average rating and the names of albums that share this rating. Relies on 'release_name' for album identification and 'avg_rating' for evaluation.

albums.description: A list of album names to evaluate. The function searches the 'release_name' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: sum_streams_given_songs
functions.description: Calculates the total number of streams for a specified list of songs. Accepts either a list of song names or a single comma-separated string of song names. Utilizes the 'track_name' for song identification and 'streams' for summing.

songs.description: A list of song names, or a single string of comma-separated song names, to calculate total streams for. Matches against the 'track_name' column in the SONGS_SQL dataset.

functions.name: highest_rated_albums
functions.description: Retrieves albums that have an average rating above a specified threshold and a minimum number of ratings. Filters based on 'avg_rating' and 'rating_count' columns, providing detailed album information.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating albums must meet to be included. Searches the 'avg_rating' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have to be considered. Filters using the 'rating_count' column.

functions.name: albums_by_release_date
functions.description: Retrieves all albums released on a specific date, in a specific month, or in a specific year, based on the provided release date, searching through the 'release_date' column in the ALBUMS_SQL dataset. It includes album name, artist name, release date, genres, descriptors, average rating, rating count, and review count.

release_date.description: The release date to filter albums by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

functions.name: songs_by_artist
functions.description: Retrieves all songs by a specific artist, including details such as track name, artist(s) name, album name, artist count, release date, streams, and various musical and acoustic properties like BPM, danceability, and duration in minutes.

artist_name.description: The artist's name to search songs for. The search is performed within the 'artist_name' column, supporting partial matches.

function_sets.name: Music - 1 parameter functions with simple function description, no examples.

functions.name: albums_by_artist
functions.description: Returns all albums by a given artist.

functions.name: top_rated_albums
functions.description: Returns the top-rated albums based on average rating.

n.description: The number of albums to return. Default is 10.

functions.name: artist_by_album
functions.description: Returns the artist of an album by its name.

functions.name: albums_by_genres
functions.description: Retrieves a list of albums that contain any of the specified genres.

genres.description: A list of genre strings the albums must contain.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs
functions.description: Returns the n most streamed songs.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Default is 10.

functions.name: songs_by_release_date
functions.description: Retrieves all songs released on a specific date, in a specific month, or in a specific year, based on the provided release date.

release_date.description: The release date to filter songs by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

functions.name: songs_by_longest_duration
functions.description: Returns the top 'n' songs sorted by their duration, from longest to shortest.

n.description: The number of top songs to return, based on duration. Defaults to 10 if not specified.

functions.name: artist_by_song
functions.description: Returns the artist of the song.

functions.name: songs_by_artist
functions.description: Returns all songs by a given artist.

function_sets.name: Music - Multi(>1) parameter functions with simple function description, no examples.

functions.name: filter_albums_by_date_range
functions.description: Filters and retrieves albums released within a specified date range. The range is inclusive of the start and end dates.

start_date.description: The start date of the date range for filtering albums. Can be in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date of the date range for filtering albums. Can be in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: albums_by_genres2
functions.description: Retrieves albums that match specified inclusion and exclusion genre criteria.

genres_in.description: A list of genre strings the albums must contain.

genres_out.description: A list of genre strings the albums must not contain.

functions.name: albums_by_date_and_genres
functions.description: Retrieves albums released on a specific date, in a specific month, or in a specific year that match any of the specified genres.

release_date.description: The release date of the albums. Can be in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

genres.description: A list of genre strings to filter albums by.

functions.name: high_rated_albums
functions.description: Retrieves albums with an average rating above a specified threshold and a minimum number of ratings.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating for the albums. Defaults to 4.0 if not specified.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have. Defaults to 100 if not specified.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs_by_genre
functions.description: Retrieves the top streamed songs within a specific genre, sorted by number of streams.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Defaults to 5 if not specified.

functions.name: songs_by_danceability_explicitness
functions.description: Retrieves songs that meet a specified danceability threshold and explicitness criteria.

danceability_threshold.description: The minimum danceability rating (percentage) to filter songs by.

explicit.description: Flag to filter songs by explicit content. Defaults to True if not specified.

functions.name: albums_by_year_genres_and_descriptors
functions.description: Retrieves albums released on a specific date, month, or year, that fit within specified genres and match given descriptors.

release_date.description: Release date to filter albums by, in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

genres.description: List of genres to filter albums by.

descriptors.description: List of descriptors to match albums with.

functions.name: high_rated_reviewed_albums
functions.description: Retrieves albums that meet specific criteria of high average ratings, a minimum number of ratings, and a minimum number of reviews.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating for the albums.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have.

review_threshold.description: The minimum number of reviews an album must have.

functions.name: songs_by_danceability_explicitness_speechiness
functions.description: Retrieves songs based on specified thresholds for danceability, speechiness, and explicit content criteria.

danceability_threshold.description: The minimum danceability rating (percentage) to filter songs by.

speechiness_threshold.description: The minimum speechiness rating (percentage) to filter songs by.

explicit.description: Flag to filter songs by explicit content. Defaults to True if not specified.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs_by_artist_date
functions.description: Retrieves the top streamed songs by a specific artist, released on a given date, month, or year.

artist_name.description: The name of the artist whose songs are to be retrieved.

release_date.description: The release date of the songs to filter by, in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Defaults to 5 if not specified.

functions.name: unique_albums
functions.description: Finds albums that are distinctive in terms of genre diversity and artist collaboration but have lower average ratings.

genres_threshold.description: The minimum number of genres an album must cover.

artist_count_threshold.description: The minimum number of artists required to be involved in an album.

max_rating_threshold.description: The maximum average rating that an album can have.

functions.name: albums_by_dates_genres_rating
functions.description: Retrieves albums released within a specific date range, filtered by genres to include and exclude, and having an average rating above a specified minimum threshold.

start_date.description: The start date of the date range for filtering albums, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date of the date range for filtering albums, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

genre_in.description: List of genres that the albums must include.

genre_out.description: List of genres that the albums must not include.

min_rating.description: The minimum average rating threshold for the albums.

functions.name: high_rated_reviewed_albums_by_date
functions.description: Retrieves albums that exceed a certain rating threshold, have a minimum number of ratings and reviews, and are released on a specified date.

rating_threshold.description: The minimum average rating for the albums.

min_ratings.description: The minimum number of ratings an album must have.

review_threshold.description: The minimum number of reviews an album must have.

release_date.description: The release date of the albums, in YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs_by_artist_date_range
functions.description: Finds the top streamed songs by a specific artist within a given date range, and returns a specified number of these top songs.

artist_name.description: The name of the artist whose songs are to be retrieved.

start_date.description: The start date of the date range for filtering songs, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date of the date range for filtering songs, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Defaults to 5 if not specified.

functions.name: speechiness_songs
functions.description: Finds songs based on specific criteria of speechiness, energy, explicit content, and BPM, allowing a tolerance range for speechiness and energy values.

speechiness.description: Target threshold for speechiness with an acceptable deviation defined by the threshold.

energy.description: Target threshold for energy with an acceptable deviation defined by the threshold.

explicit.description: Flag indicating whether to filter for explicit content.

bpm.description: Target Beats Per Minute (BPM) to filter songs by.

threshold.description: Range value to determine the acceptable deviation from the speechiness and energy thresholds. Defaults to 20 if not specified.

functions.name: instrumental_songs
functions.description: Identifies songs based on specified levels of instrumentalness, valence, danceability, and BPM, with a tolerance range for each parameter.

instrumentalness.description: Target threshold for instrumentalness, with a specified deviation range.

valence.description: Target threshold for valence, with a specified deviation range.

danceability.description: Target threshold for danceability, with a specified deviation range.

bpm.description: Target Beats Per Minute (BPM) to filter songs by.

threshold.description: Range value to determine the acceptable deviation from the instrumentalness, valence, and danceability thresholds.
